name: SHRINE_HURDLE_HELP
translation:
Tsuruga Grand Shrine

Realm of Trials Time Rule|Realm of Trials will occur in seasons, consisting of a challenge phase (12 days) and a rest phase (2 days).

Entry Rules|1. At the beginning of each season, the number of Trial Invitations owned will be set to 15 (max capacity).|2. There will be 3 different Trials in each season with different environmental effects in each Trial to boost your Girls in different ways. You can choose which Trial to enter manually. It will cost you 1 Trial Invitation to enter a Trial.|3. Only Girls who are 10-star or above can be chosen for Trials, once a Girl is chosen to enter a Trial, her attribute and status in this Trial (including her Gear and Potential status) will not be updated by the adjustments you make in other features.

Difficulty Level|1. You will need to choose the Difficulty Level once you enter a Trial.|2. The enemies\' attributes and points they provide after each battle will be boosted if you choose a higher Difficulty Level.|3. Higher Difficulty Levels can be unlocked as your points recorded for Trials become higher.|4 After unlocking a Difficulty Level, it will remain unlocked in the following seasons.

Trial Rules|There are 15 Stages in a Trial, where you will encounter Battle Stages, Reward Stages, Store Stages, Recover Stages, and Boss Stages in your Trials.|Battle Stage|1. Enemies spawn at random, you can tap on the icons of the enemies to check out their status. You can choose to deploy your Girls to defeat the enemies and win points.|2. Each battle of Battle Stages lasts for 15 rounds. You can win in a battle if you defeat the enemies in 15 rounds, but will lose the battle if all your Girls are defeated or the battle exceeds 15 rounds.|3. The HP of your Girls will not recover after each battle.|4. The status of the enemies will be reset after you lose a battle.|Reward Stage|1. There will be 3 random buffs available for you to choose in a Reward Stage.|2. You can also give up a chance to get a buff and receive Trial Tokens instead. Trial Tokens can be used in Store Stages.|Store Stage|1. Buff Purchase: there will be 3 random buffs available for you to purchase with Trial Tokens.|2. Buff Upgrade: 3 random buffs you own will appear, you can choose to upgrade them with Trial Tokens. Each buff can be upgraded twice in a Trial.|Recover Stage|1. You can choose to heal your Girls or revive a defeated Girl in a Recover Stage.|Boss Stage|1. You can only challenge a Boss Stage once in a Trial. (There\'s only 1 Boss Stage in each Trial) You will complete the Trial after the battle.|2. The enemy in Boss Stage cannot be defeated, you can earn more points if you deal higher damage in the stage.

Points and Ranking|1. Your overall points from all 3 Trials will be recorded and ranked. Points earned for each Trial will also be ranked. Once the challenge phase ends, rewards will be sent according to rankings.

Tasks|1. Tasks will be refreshed at the start of each season.

Pond of Prayers|1. You can exchange rewards with "Origami Cranes" in Pond of Prayers.|2. Seasonal merchandise will be refreshed at the start of each season, but permanent merchandise will not be refreshed.

Higher Difficulty Levels can be unlocked as your points record for Trials becomes higher.

name: CHIME_HELP
translation:
1. On the branches of this enormous tree hang countless Chimes, artifacts that provide boosts to Girls.|2. Collect the required amount of Chime Shards to activate a Chime, and use Fantasy Dust and Fantasy Talisman to upgrade it.
You can increase the base attributes of a Chime by charging the Chimelight in it. Chimelight can be charged to 100%% maximum.
Additional effects of the Chimes will be available to be Enchanted after Chimelight reaches certain requirements.
After the Chimelight of a Chime reaches 100%% and all its effects are Enchanted, it will be able to be Ascended.|3. The shards of Chimes and the resources to upgrade your Chimes can be obtained from Message Board and Pond of Prayers in Tsuruga Grand Shrine.|4. The spare shards of Chimes (after you have enough shards to fully upgrade a Chime, the surplus shards will be considered as spare shards) can be transferred into Chime Chips, which can be used to exchange rewards in Pond of Prayers.

name: ACTIVITY_PROMOTION_LADDER_TEXT01
translation: 1. You can exchange the Girls you have for the updated Girl by consuming Promotion Certificates during the event.|2. 10 Promotion Certificates will be required for each 5-star Girl copy you obtain from the exchange. The number of Promotion Certificates required in the exchange of each copy of the new updated Girl will be increased by 5 after every 9 copies exchanged during the event.|3. After the exchange, the new updated Girl you get will have the same level, star rank, Gear status, Crystal status, and Antique status as the Girl you use to exchange, however, the exchange will not let the Girl you get inherit the intimacy or the Oath status of the Girl you used for the exchange.|4. The system will see the exchange of the Girls of higher star rank as multiple copies exchanged: 6-8 star = 2 copies exchanged, 9 star = 3 copies exchanged, 10 star = 5 copies exchanged, 11 star = 6 copies exchanged, 12-13 star = 7 copies exchanged, 14 star = 8 copies exchanged, 15 star = 9 copies exchanged.|5. The Girls available for you to use for the exchange will be different during each event. You can check out the Girls available by tapping the "!" button in the top right corner of the event page.|6. The new updated Girl(s) you obtain via exchanging in this event won't advance the progress of the "New Girls" Task in the event: "Girls X Capsule Points".|8. Promotion Certificates won't be removed from your account after the event ends.

name: GAME_ASSISTANT_HELP01
translation: [c][0069cc]Requirement:[-][/c]|Pass Stage {1} in Campaign.|[c][0069cc]Daily[-][/c]|1. If “Yes” is selected in the Capsule-related settings, then the Free Chances will be used first if any are available;|2. Only the Slot Machine will be drawn from. The Game Assistant will not draw from the Super Slot Machine;|3. The Game Assistant will claim rewards from the highest Daily Quiz Level that you can claim from;|4. In the opponents that you are paired with, the Game Assistant will challenge the team with the lowest Battle Power;|5. You can select multiple star ranks in Internship, the system will automatically complete the Internship Quests with lower star rank first according to your setup.|6. In Daily page, you can initiate the operations only once. (your purchases from Market and claiming loot/rewards in Campaign or Dorm are excluded)|[c][0069cc]Challenges[-][/c]|1. The Patrol Team lineup needs to be set up before the Raid Rewards can be claimed by the Game Assistant;|2. After choosing the House of the House Exams, if you have already cleared several stages, the Game Assistant can use Certificates to Raid the cleared stages.;|[c][0069cc]Growth[-][/c]|1. Excursion Resources can be claimed once per hour;|2. After claiming training rewards, the Game Assistant will automatically restart the training with the same setup;|3. When challenging the Training Dummy, the Game Assistant will use Servants according to the order they are listed in Servant Training page;|[c][0069cc]Guild[-][/c]|1. If you're not able to get orders when using the feature, the part that assists you with the Guild-Cafeteria will not be available. |2. Before getting new Orders, the Game Assistant will claim rewards from completed Orders. If there are orders waiting to be started, it will automatically start them;|3. When calculating the Gems needed to upgrade the orders, all the orders you get will be counted as Lv.1 orders. (You might actually get Lv.1-3 orders, the orders that are Lv. 2-3 will actually consume you less Gems to be upgraded to Lv.6) Therefore, fewer Gems might be actually consumed than the system predicted when upgrading orders in Cafeteria;|4. If you choose to challenge the 61st boss in Gym, all challenge chances of the day will be used.

name: ACTIVITY_LASSO_HELP
translation: 1. You can toss 1 ring by consuming 1 Ring Toss Ticket during the event. With the help of the Girls, each ring you toss will guarantee a win. The reward for each type of doll is different.|2. You will get the Grand Prize of a round if you hit the biggest doll in the middle (there will also be a random reward for hitting the biggest doll too). After obtaining the Grand Prize, the game will reset and you will enter the next round.|3. The Grand Prize for each round is different. When there are multiple Grand Prizes available in a round, you can only choose to obtain one of them. The Grand Prize selection after round 26 is fixed. After obtaining all rewards in a round after round 26, the game will reset and you will be able to enter the next round and re-select the Grand Prize for the new round.|4. If you've already hit the biggest Doll before using up the Ring Toss Tickets you plan to consume in bulk, the unused Ring Toss Tickets will be returned and you will advance to the next round.|5. Ring Toss Ticket can be obtained from Daily Mail, completing Girls X Capsule Points, purchasing Explorer Packs, Mega Value Pack, Special Gift Pack, and Special Skin Pack.|6. After the event is over, unused Ring Toss Tickets will automatically be retrieved by the system and exchanged into Coins. Each Ring Toss Ticket is worth 50K.

name: ACTIVITY_CLOCK_HELP
translation: 1. During the event, 1 Clockwork Coin can be consumed to spin the one-pointer spinner once and obtain its reward. If multiple pointers are used for the spinner, you will get multiple rewards for the spin, but the Clockwork Coins required will also thus be increased.|2. There are Grand Rewards and Regular Rewards displayed on the spinner, Regular Rewards can be obtained multiple times (the number of rewards that haven't been claimed in this round yet are displayed in the center of the spinner). Each Grand Reward can be obtained only once. After obtaining all the Grand Rewards in a round, the remaining rewards on the spinner will be automatically obtained without consuming additional Clockwork Coins.|3. After obtaining all rewards displayed on the spinner, you will enter the next round. Rewards will be different in the first 5 rounds, whereas starting from the 6th round, the rewards will be the same as in the 5th round.|4. You will get additional rewards according to the number of Clockwork Coins you've consumed.|5. Clockwork Coins can be obtained from Daily Mail, by participating in the Prank War, Slot Points event, or by purchasing Mega Value Pack, Special Gift Pack, Special Skin Pack, April Fools Pack, or Monthly Kickoff.|6. After this event ends, any remaining Clockwork Coins will be automatically exchanged into 20K Coins each. The Coins will be sent via Mail.

name: ACTIVITY_CLOCK_TASK

For each Simulation Coin consumed, you can exchange all the Girls in a Simulation result.|6. After the event ends, your remaining Simulation Coins will be automatically used to exchange the Capsule Simulation Records you saved during the event (according to the order of Slot numbers), the Girls you get will be sent via Mail.

name: NEW_TRIAL_BATTLEPASS_HELP
translation: 1. Sanctuary Pass will refresh its progress every 30 days. The exact refresh time is based on when a player creates their account.|2. You can obtain Sanctuary Points to upgrade your Sanctuary Pass and get more rewards by challenging Sanctuary Stages.|3. You can win 25 Sanctuary Points for passing Stage 1, 2, 5, and 6, 50 Sanctuary Points for passing Stage 3 and 7, and 10 Sanctuary Points for each bar of HP cleared in Boss Stage.|4. There will be 5 reward plans to choose from in each season of Sanctuary Pass, you can choose 1 reward plan for a season's rewards.|5. The selection of reward plan cannot be adjusted again in a season after you collect any reward.|6. You are able to purchase 1000 additional Sanctuary Points with Gems in each season. If you have purchased access to the additional rewards of the season's Sanctuary Pass, you will be able to purchase another 2000 Sanctuary Points in the last day of the season.

name: ACTIVITY_EASTER2022_HELP
translation: 1. During the event, you can break a random egg by consuming 1 Easter Slingshot, or break a random line of eggs by consuming 1 Laser Gun. (You can use multiple Easter Slingshots at a time, but once a Special Easter Egg is hit by an Easter Slingshot, the system will stop consuming Easter Slingshots and return the remaining to you.) After each egg is broken, an egg that is of the same type will be supplied to the same line from the left side.|2. You can obtain rewards inside the Regular Easter Eggs and Special Easter Eggs (The rewards inside each Special Easter Egg can be seen) by breaking them. The possible reward for the Easter Eggs can be checked by tapping the magnifying glass button on the top left corner.|3. You can obtain additional rewards according to the number of eggs you have broken.|4. You will also be able to get rewards by completing the tasks. Details of the tasks can be checked by tapping the task button on the top right corner.

name: NEW_TRIAL_BATTLEPASS_TEXT17

name: ACTIVITY_RELAY_GIFT_TEXT01

name: ACTIVITY_RELAY_GIFT_TEXT02

name: ARENA_NEW_HLEP
translation: Battle Rules|1. League Rank rewards are sent to players daily at 21:00 (UTC/GMT 0).|2. Each League battle costs 1 League Ticket (available for Gems).|3. Each League battle lasts 15 rounds. If the battle exceeds 15 rounds, Girls remaining will increase their Attack and lower their Healing received each round until the battle is over.|4. Each battle awards points that count towards your League Rank. Points are gained for winning and lost for being defeated.|5. You can check out the 10 most recent battle replays in Battle Log.||Reward Rules|Rewards will be sent to the highest ranking players every day.|For details, please check 「Daily Reward」.|6. The point reward you get is based on the difference between your current points and your enemy's current points. (However, the point reward can be 0 if your current points is too high in comparison to your enemy's.)|7. In Cross-Server Junior Varsity, players from several servers will compete together. The number of servers to form a Cross-Server Junior Varsity will be different according to the number of players in each server.|8. The first hour in each season of Cross-Server Junior Varsity is the preparation phase, you cannot challenge other players during the phase.

name: ACTIVITY_LOST_SPACE_EXIT_TIPS1
translation: Confirm to enter the next space zone?

name: ACTIVITY_LOST_SPACE_EXIT_TIPS2
translation: Please claim the rewards you found before entering the next Space Zone.

name: ACTIVITY_LOST_SPACE_SKILL_CHANGE
translation: Laser Energy will be reset to 0 after switching the skill, confirm to continue?

name: ACTIVITY_LOST_SPACE_HELP_TEXT
translation: 1. During the event, you are able to explore the Space Zone with Space Radars. You will get a reward for each block of area explored. But only the blocks neighboring the explored blocks can be explored.|2. There is a portal hidden in each Space Zone. After finding and tapping the portal (but you need to claim the rewards in your current Space Zone first), you can get a reward for the current Space Zone and enter the next Space Zone.|3. Supply Coordinates will appear in certain Space Zones. After collecting 3 Supply Coordinates, a Supply Stash will appear. You can enter the Supply Space Zone and gain huge rewards by tapping on its icon.|4. You can select a skill to support you in your exploration. 1 Laser Energy will be provided for each Space Radar consumed. The skill you select will be able to be triggered to explore multiple blocks of area once your Laser Energy is full.|5. You can adjust your skill selection any time you want. But your Laser Energy will be reset to 0 once you switch your skill. Once your Laser Energy is full, you won't be able to obtain more Laser Energy.|6. The rewards you find during the exploration will need to be claimed, there's a button in the event page that can help you to claim the rewards in bulk. But the special events will need you to tap and trigger manually.|7. Space Radars can be obtained through Daily Mail, purchasing Mega Value Pack, Special Skin Pack, Special Gift Pack, Lucky Bonus, and Space Station Supply.|8. Auto Explore will be available when you have 5 or more Space Radars. During Auto Explore the system will automatically trigger the special events and your skill. Auto Explore will be stopped if your Space Radars are all consumed or a portal is found.|9. Once the event ends, the remaining Space Radars will automatically be exchanged into Coins at a rate of 1000K Coins each. The Coins will be sent via Mail.

name: ACTIVITY_LOST_SPACE_SKILL_ENERGY_TIPS

name: SKILL_RESONATE_HELP
translation: 1. Skill-Synchronize is exclusive for Girls from House Cosmos.|2. You can upgrade the Girls' skill level by consuming Brilliant Spheres and Tarnished Spheres. The Synchronize Level of a Girl will be the total level of her skills.|3. When a skill is upgraded to a certain level, it will require the other 3 skills to reach a certain level to become available to upgrade again.|4. Cosmos Girls will also gain additional Attribute bonuses as their Synchronize Level goes up.|5. You can reset the Synchronize Level and retrieve all the material that was used to upgrade the Synchronize Level with Gems.

name: STAR_ORIGIN_HELP
translation: 1. Astral Core will become available for a Girl after she reaches 15-star. The feature will help your Girls to gain additional Attribute bonuses from the stars.|2. You can upgrade the level of Astral Core Nodes by consuming Brilliant Spheres and Tarnished Spheres.|3. The Attack and HP attribute bonus provided by Astral Core Nodes will not be affected by the attribute increase effects based on the percentages.|4. You are able to reset the Astral Core Nodes' levels and retrieve all the materials consumed with Gems.|5. If a Girl has upgraded her Astral Core, you will get all the resources used to upgrade the Astral Core back when you Reverse or Exchange the Girl.

You will also have a chance to obtain an additional reward for each exchange (Childhood Delight).|2. Rabbit Balloons can be obtained from Daily Mail, Lucky Bonus, or be purchased with Gems (you can purchase 50 Rabbit Balloons with Gems in total).|3. After this event ends, any remaining Rabbit Balloons will be automatically exchanged into 50K Coins each. The Coins will be sent via Mail.

name: ACTIVITY_SPFARM_TEXT01
translation: Enter the manor and seek the power that could help...

name: ACTIVITY_SPFARM_HELP1
translation: 1. The event lasts for 15 days. You can grow Flowers to obtain rewards and Raid the Manor of other players during the first 14 days. The 15th day of the event will be the display period. You will not be able to Raid during the display period. The Flowers will also not produce more resources during display period.|2. By tapping on an unoccupied Block, you can grow Flowers. These Flowers can produce various types of resources that can be collected at 0:00 (UTC/GMT 0) every day.|3. You will need to consume 100 Marvelous Seeds each time you plant or upgrade a Flower. You can also switch the type of Flower by consuming (50 * the current level of the Flower you wish to switch) Marvelous Seeds. In addition, you can adjust the location of your Flowers freely by tapping and holding on them.|4. New policies can be approved by consuming Loud Speakers at your Manor Center.|5. You can increase the Fame of your Manor by 1 and get additional rewards for every 3 policies approved.|6. You can also Raid the Manors of other players and get their resources. 1 Raid Ticket needs to be consumed to begin a Raid. You will get 3 Raid Tickets each day in the first 14 days of the event. You can also purchase more Raid Tickets with Gems, you are able to purchase 15 Raid Tickets at most in this way.|7. The resource hiding in the Manors you can Raid will be richer as the Total Level of Flowers in your Manor becomes higher.|8. You can deploy defenders for your Flower. The defenders will try their best to stop the invaders.|9. Once the event ends, the remaining Marvelous Seeds, Loud Speakers, and Raid Tickets will automatically be exchanged into Coins at a rate of 1K Coins per Marvelous Seed, 50K Coins per Loud Speaker, and 20K Coins per Raid Ticket. The Coins will be sent via Mail.|10. Ripen will be available after reaching Fame Level 10. You will be able to consume 1000 Marvelous Seed to get an additional day's resource from a Level 10 Flower instantly. Ripen will still be available during display period.

name: ACTIVITY_SPFARM_HELP2
translation: 1. You will be teleported to the Manor Center of another player's Manor at the beginning of each Raid.|2. Only the Manor Center is revealed at the beginning of each Raid, you can flip over the 4 Blocks (↑↓←→) beside the starting point or beside the Blocks that have been flipped over.|3. When there is a defender revealed on a flipped Block, the Blocks around the defender can't be flipped over until the defender is defeated.|4. If there is a Flower revealed on a flipped Block, you can raid 20%% of the Flower's daily production and put the loot in your Bag by tapping on the Flower.|5. You can end a Raid by tapping on the Manor Center. You will be able to obtain the loot you collected in your Bag after you end this Raid.

name: DELETE_ACCOUNT_TEXT08
translation:
This Privacy Policy applies to Carolgames Platform (Carolgames), websites and related services, which is collectively called the Service. We may periodically update this Privacy Policy by posting a new version on Carolgames Platform (Carolgames). If we make any material changes, we will notify you by posting a notice in the Service prior to the change becoming effective. Your continued use of the Service after the effective date will be subject to the new Privacy Policy.


THE DATA WE COLLECT
Data you provide us.
1. Contact information (such as name and email address)
2. Player name and password
3. Profile information (such as profile photo)
4. Your messages to the Service (such as chat logs and player support tickets)
5. Other data you choose to give us (such as data to identify a lost account)


Data we collect automatically.
1. Data about your account and game progress
2. Your IP address and mobile device identifiers (such as your device ID, advertising ID, MAC address, IMEI)
3. Data about your device, such as device name and operating system, browser type and language
4. Data we collect with cookies and similar technologies
5. General location data
6. Data about your use of the Service (such as gameplay data and your interactions with other players inside the Service)


In most cases, we also create a Carolgames Platform (Carolgames).-specific ID for you when you use the Service.
Data we collect from our partners.
1. Data we receive if you bind to a third party tool with the Service (such as Facebook, Game Center or Google)
2. Demographic data (such as to determine the coarse location of your IP address)
3. Data to fight fraud (such as refund abuse in games or click fraud in advertising)
4. Data from platforms that the games run on (such as to verify payment)
5. Data for advertising and analytics purposes, so we can provide you with better Service


WHY DO WE COLLECT YOUR DATA
To make the Service work.
To perform the contract, we process data necessary to:
1. Create accounts and allow you to play our games and use our Service
2. Operate the Service
3. Verify and confirm payments
4. Provide and deliver products and services you request
5. Send you Service-related communications


To make the Service more suitable for our players.
To provide greater Service to our players, we have a legitimate interest to collect and process necessary data to:
1. Update and develop player profiles
2. Develop and improve the Service and player experience
3. Manage our relationship with you
4. Provide social features as part of the Service
5. Customize your Service experience
6. Respond to your comments and questions and provide player support
7. Provide you Carolgames Platform (Carolgames) offers in the Service as well as in other websites and services, and by email
8. Send you related information, such as updates, security alerts, and support messages
9. Enable you to communicate with other players
10. Display personalized advertisement


To display personalized advertisements.
To show you personalized advertisements in the Service as well as in other websites and services (including email) we have a legitimate interest to process necessary data to:
1. Track the content you access in connection with the Service and your online behavior；
2. Deliver, target and improve our advertising and the Service
3. For information on how to opt-out from personalized advertisements, see section \'Your rights and options\' below:
To keep the Service safe and fair Ensuring a level playing field in the Service is a top priority for us. For more information on our acceptable use policy, see the Carolgames Platform (Carolgames) Terms of Service.


To keep the Service safe and fair.
In order to keep the Service and its social features safe and fair, to fight fraud and ensure acceptable use otherwise, we have a legitimate interest to process necessary data to:
1. Analyze and monitor use of the Service and its social features
2. Moderate chats either automatically or manually
3. Take action against fraudulent or misbehaving players
4. To analyze, profile, and segment.
In all of the above cases and purposes, we may analyze, profile and segment all collected data.
With your consent, we may process your data for additional purposes, such as using your GPS location to show you local events.


WHO CAN SEE YOUR DATA
Apart from Carolgames Platform (Carolgames), your data can be accessed by others in the following situations:
OTHER PLAYERS AND USERS.
Social features are a core component of our games. Other players and users may, for example, see your profile data, in-game activities and read the messages you have posted.
PARTNERS WORKING With Carolgames Platform (Carolgames).
Carolgames Platform (Carolgames) has partners to perform services for us. These partners process your data only at and according to Carolgames Platform (Carolgames).´s instructions to provide the Service, such as hosting, player support, advertising, analytics and fraud prevention.
Other companies and public authorities.
In order to combat fraud and illegal activity, we may exchange data with other companies and organizations and provide it to public authorities in response to lawful requests.
We may also disclose your data based on your consent, to comply with the law or to protect the rights, property or safety of us, our players or others.
Advertising and Social Media partners.
The Service includes features from our partners, such as social media interaction tools and in-game advertising. These partners may access your data and operate under their own privacy policies. We encourage you to check their privacy policies to learn more about their data processing practices.


INTERNATIONAL DATA TRANSFERS
Our Service is global by nature and your data can therefore be transferred to anywhere in the world. Because different countries may have different data protection laws than your own country, we take steps to ensure adequate safeguards are in place to protect your data as explained in this Policy. Adequate safeguards that our partners may use include standard contractual clauses approved by EU Commission and the Privacy Shield certification in case of transfers to the US


YOUR RIGHTS AND OPTIONS
Opt-out of marketing emails and other direct marketing.
You may opt-out of receiving promotional communications, such as marketing emails from us by following the instructions in such communications.
Opt-out of targeted advertising.
You can opt-out of interest-based advertising on mobile applications by checking the privacy settings of your Android or iOS device and selecting "limit ad tracking" (Apple iOS) or "opt-out of interest based ads" (Android).
For personalized in-game offers opt-out, you can use the options provided in the game settings.


Your other rights.
You also have the right to correct your data, have your data deleted, object how we use or share your data, and restrict how we use or share your data. You can always withdraw your consent, for example by turning off GPS location sharing in your mobile device settings.
We will respond to all requests within a reasonable timeframe. If you have an unresolved privacy or data use concern that we have not addressed satisfactorily, please contact our U.S.-based third-party dispute resolution provider (free of charge). You may also contact your local data protection authority within the European Economic Area for unresolved complaints.


COOKIES AND SIMILAR TECHNOLOGIES
Like most online services, we and our partners use cookies and similar technologies to provide and personalize the Service, analyze use, target advertisements and prevent fraud. You can disable cookies in your browser settings, but some parts of the Service may then not function properly.


HOW DO WE PROTECT YOUR DATA
Security Safeguards
In order to help ensure a secure and safe player experience, we are continuously developing and implementing administrative, technical and physical security measures to protect your data from unauthorized access or against loss, misuse or alteration.
Data retention.
We retain your data for as long as your account is active or as needed to provide you the Service. We will for example periodically de-identify unused game accounts and we regularly review and de-identify unnecessary data.
Note that if you ask us to remove your personal data, we will retain your data as necessary for our legitimate business interests, such as to comply with our legal obligations, resolve disputes, and enforce our agreements.


AGE LIMITS
We do not knowingly collect or solicit personal data about or direct or target interest-based advertising to anyone under the age of 15 or knowingly allow such persons to use our Services. If you are under 15, please do not send any data about yourself to us, including your name, address, telephone number, or email address. No one under the age of 15 may provide any personal data. If we learn that we have collected personal data about a child under age 15, we will delete that data as quickly as possible. If you believe that we might have any data from or about a child under the age of 15, please contact us.


YOUR CHOICES AND CONTROLS
We seek to provide you with meaningful choices about the personal information we collect. The specific choices available to you often vary depending on the exact nature of our relationship with you, such as the Carolgames Services you use. Common examples include:
You can request that we provide access to, or that we correct or delete, personal information we’ve collected from you. Please submit requests to access, update, or delete personal information associated with your Carolgames account by reaching out to us via in-game Customer Service channel or as described in “Contact Us” below. Note that we may ask you for additional information to help us verify who you are before completing your request.
You can change your email marketing preferences at any time, such as by using the unsubscribe link provided in our marketing emails or contacting us with your request (see “Contact Us” below).
You may be able to change your privacy settings on other parties’ websites (such as Facebook) to limit the information they may share with us.
You can change your browser or mobile device settings to block, manage, delete, or limit tracking technologies like cookies. In some cases, blocking or disabling cookies may cause the Carolgames Services not to work as intended and some features may not be available.
Some parts of the world provide individuals with specific choices related to their personal information by right under local law.


CONTACT US
If you have questions, concerns, or requests related to this policy, you may contact our game customer service E-mail as below:

girls2@carolgames.com (Girls X Battle 2)

translation: 1. Girls from 1-Star to 5-Star and 7-Star to 10-Star can be Reversed (including those who have Limit-Break status). 6-Star Girls cannot be reversed for now. Dolls are not able to be Awakened, Exchanged, Reversed, Transferred, given Gifts or placed in a Dorm.|2. Gear and Antiques of a Girl who is Reversed will automatically be sent back to Bag.|3. Results of Reversal: |1-Star to 5-Star: the namesake Girl at their original star rank|7-Star Girl Reversal: 8 5-Star Dolls of the Reversed Girl's Faction + 2 namesake 5-Star Girls|8-Star Girl Reversal: 1 6-Star Doll of the Reversed Girl's Faction + 11 5-Star Dolls of the Reversed Girl's Faction + 2 namesake 5-Star Girls|9-Star Girl Reversal: 2 6-Star Dolls of the Reversed Girl's Faction + 13 5-Star Dolls of the Reversed Girl's Faction + 3 namesake 5-Star Girls|10-Star Girl Reversal: 1 9-Star Doll of the Reversed Girl's Faction + 3 6-star Dolls of the Reversed Girls Faction + 13 5-star Dolls of the Reversed Girl's Faction + 5 namesake 5-Star Girls|Limit-Break Stage 1 Girl Reversal: 2 9-Star Dolls of the Reversed Girl's Faction + 3 6-star Dolls of the Reversed Girls Faction + 13 5-star Dolls of the Reversed Girl's Faction + 6 namesake 5-Star Girls|Limit-Break Stage 2 Girl Reversal: 3 9-Star Dolls of the Reversed Girl's Faction + 3 6-star Dolls of the Reversed Girls Faction + 13 5-star Dolls of the Reversed Girl's Faction + 7 namesake 5-Star Girls|Limit-Break Stage 3 Girl Reversal: 1 10-Star Doll + 3 9-Star Dolls of the Reversed Girl's Faction + 3 6-star Dolls of the Reversed Girls Faction + 13 5-star Dolls of the Reversed Girl's Faction + 7 namesake 5-Star Girls|Limit-Break Stage 4 Girl Reversal: 2 10-Star Dolls of the Reversed Girl's Faction + 39-Star Dolls of the Reversed Girl's Faction + 3 6-star Dolls of the Reversed Girls Faction + 13 5-star Dolls of the Reversed Girl's Faction + 8 namesake 5-Star Girls|Limit-Break Stage 5 Girl Reversal: 3 10-Star Dolls of the Reversed Girl's Faction + 3 9-Star Dolls of the Reversed Girl's Faction + 3 6-star Dolls of the Reversed Girls Faction + 13 5-star Dolls of the Reversed Girl's Faction + 9 namesake 5-Star Girls|4. Reversing 1-Star to 15-Star Girls will return all resources used on the Girl. (If Outfit bonuses were triggered when upgrading the Girls' Crystal, this will also be considered in the calculation) When a Girl at 10-Star or above is reversed, ALL resources used to upgrade her Elite Skills will be returned. For 15-star Girls, resources used to upgrade their Astral Core will also be returned.|5. Intimacy and Oath will be returned to one of the namesake Girls after being reversed.|6. 5/9/10 Star Dolls received from a Reverse won't be counted for the Monthly Event "Graduate and Awake".

name: GUILD_COMPETITION_PARTNER_HELP
translation: 1. Girls that can be awakened to 15-star (House Cosmos excluded) can be sent to the Extra Course during the Sky Island event.|2. The star-rank and level of Girls you send to the Extra Course will be increased to the same as your Girl with the highest star-rank and level. In addition, the Elite skill level of the Girls sent to the Extra Course will also be adjusted according to her current star-rank (in Extra Course). 11-15 stars correspond to Elite skill level 1-5. The Girls sent to the Extra Course will be equipped with Gears of 3-star Pink quality. You can also modify the Gear set skills, Crystals, Antiques and Potentials of these Girls.|3. 50K Coins can be used to enter a Real Battle with the Girls that were sent to the Extra Course. After a Girl that is sent to the Extra Course completes a Real Battle, all Girls with the same name can no longer be sent to the Extra Course on the same day.|4. If your Girl with the highest star-rank and level is upgraded or promoted to a higher star-rank, you will need to reset the Girl in Extra course to update her promoted status.

name: ACTIVITY_GOLDFISH_HELP
translation: 1. Hermes has opened her business on the beach, let's go check it out!|2. Get corresponding rewards by scooping fish with Paper Scoops. For each regular goldfish scooped, 200 Goldfish Coins will be added to the general reward pool. For each special goldfish scooped (the one carrying Cupid or Promethea Chest will be considered as a regular goldfish), you will be able to get your share in percentage of Goldfish Coins from the general reward pool. (The actual percentage of Goldfish Coins you can get each time might be different for each special goldfish you scoop).|3. Hermes will predict a vague number of Goldfish Coins you can get according to the number of Paper Scoops used. If the actual number of Goldfish Coins you obtained is below her prediction, you will receive additional Goldfish Coins on the last day of the event to mend the difference. You will not be able to scoop fish on the last day of the event!|4. Goldfish Coins can be used to exchange rewards in the event store. The first section of the event store is open by default, the following sections will be unlocked according to the number of Paper Scoops used.|5. You will receive additional rewards after using a certain number of Paper Scoops.|6. Once this event ends, any remaining Paper Scoops and Goldfish Coins will be automatically exchanged into 50K Coins per Paper Scoop and 100 Coins per Goldfish Coin. The Coins will be sent via Mail.

name: GALAXY_TRIP_HELP01
translation: Requirement & Duration|1. Galaxy Voyage will occur in seasons, consisting of an exploration period (27 days) and a result phase (1 day).|2. The feature will be unlocked after passing Campaign Stage 16-4 and when you have at least one 10-star Girl.|Feature Introduction|1. You can explore the galaxy in Galaxy Voyage. The enemy will become stronger and the rewards will become better as you explore further on your voyage.|2. Special events will occur during your explorations. You can clear an area instantly and claim the reward for exploring the area in an enemy encounter after defeating the enemy. For other special events, it will take you some time to complete the exploration.|3. Only the first System is available for exploration at the beginning of each season. You will need to meet certain requirements to unlock more Systems. View more details by tapping on "Progress" in the System maps.|4. You can only explore 1 System at a time. If you decide to swap to another System, the exploration progress you made in your current System will not be saved (Exploration Points and Galaxy Stones you obtained from the System, however, will be saved).|5. System of Eternity will be unlocked after you meet the requirements in the 4th System in each season. You can obtain more rewards by defeating Space Pirates and Galaxy Tyrant in the System.|6. You can obtain rewards in Voyager Passport after the number of your Exploration Points reaches certain requirements. You can also exchange more rewards with Galaxy Stones in the store of this feature.|7. All ongoing Explorations will be Recalled when the result phase begins. You can still claim the rewards from the Explored areas in the result phase, but the Exploration Points of these areas will not be counted.|8. Your Exploration Points and Exploration Progress will be reset at the beginning of each season, please remember to claim your rewards unlocked in Voyager Passport.

name: GALAXY_TRIP_HELP02
translation: System Map Introduction|1. Exploration Points for completing a same special event in different Systems will be the same, but other rewards will be different according to the System you're in.|Special Event Details:|Normal Enemy - HP won't reset to 100%% after being challenged (obtainable Exploration Points: 2)|Elite Enemy - HP won't be reset to 100%% after being challenged (obtainable Exploration Points: 4)|Ruler – Enemies need to be defeated in 1 challenge attempt (obtainable Exploration Points: 10)|Blank Space – To explore a Blank Space requires 2 hours (obtainable Exploration Points: 1)|Mystery Planet – To explore a Mystery Planet requires 1 hour (obtainable Exploration Points: 1 and a battle buff which will only be effective in your current System)|Supply Crate - To explore a Supply Crate requires 12 hours (obtainable Exploration Points: 1 and additional rewards)|Space Pirate - Enemies need to be defeated in 1 challenge attempt (obtainable Exploration Points: 10)|Galaxy Tyrant - Enemies need to be defeated in 1 challenge attempt (obtainable Exploration Points depends on difficulty level)|2. The starting point and the end point of a System are at the top and bottom of the map. You can explore the 4 Areas beside (↑↓←→) the starting point or beside the Areas that have been Explored.|3. You can explore a System by tapping on the Exploration Areas (The areas with enemies excluded). But you can also preset an exploration plan to explore multiple Exploration Areas by tapping the "Route" button.|4. When you're exploring according to a route you have preset, you can tap on the "Recall" button to cancel your current Exploration instantly and claim the rewards of the special events completed already. After that, you can adjust your Exploration Route for the next Exploration.|5. You are able to reduce the HP and Attack of the Ruler of the System (System of Eternity excluded) by 1%% for every area you explore further after your Exploration Progress reaches 30%%. (You can reduce the HP and Attack of each Ruler by 40%% at most in this way)|6. You will need to consume 1 Galaxy Challenge Coupon for each challenge attempt against enemies in the Systems (Enemies in System of Eternity excluded). The number of Galaxy Challenge Coupon you have will increase by 10 each day. You can own 25 Galaxy Challenge Coupons at most at the same time.|7. New Space Pirates will enter System of Eternity every day. The number of new Space Pirates in the system will increase as you unlock more Systems. Each Space Pirate will stay in the System for 72 hours, please remember to defeat them in time.|8. The highest difficulty level available at the start of each season is 5, you will be able to unlock higher difficulty levels by winning in battles against Galaxy Tyrant of the highest difficulty level available. (The highest difficulty level you can reach is 20)|9. If you defeat a Galaxy Tyrant of high level. The rewards for defeating the Galaxy Tyrants of the lower levels will also be given (If you haven't won these rewards).

name: GALAXY_TRIP_HELP03
translation: Voyage Team Introduction|1. You can set up 3 Voyage teams in the feature to provide additional battle buffs, Exploration Time Reduction, and Exploration Loot Increase in Galaxy Voyage. The bonus effect each Voyage Team provides will be increased if the Total Limit Break Stage of the Girls in the team reaches 5/10/15/20/25/30. But if the total Limit Break Stage of your Girls in a team is below 5, no buff will be provided by that team.|2. If a Girl is assigned to a Voyage Team, she can still be available for the battles you encounter in Galaxy Voyage.|3. You cannot adjust your Voyage Teams during an ongoing Exploration.

name: SHRINE_HURDLE_AUTO_HELP
translation: Auto-Battle Feature:|1. Once auto-battle is activated, you will enter the next Stage with a Lineup you set in the setup page.|2. When selecting the Stage to enter, the system will try to avoid selecting a Battle Stage. Your selection for buffs or Healing plans in Reward Stages and Recovery Stages will always be the first option. You can choose whether to enter Recovery Stages or Store Stages or not when setting the feature.|3. When you enter a Store Stage, the system will try to purchase and upgrade the buffs in order until your Trial Tokens are insufficient for any purchase or upgrades. You can also set to manage the purchase and upgrades manually in Store Stages when setting the feature.|4. Auto-battle will stop when entering the Boss Stage or when you leave the Trial.|5. You can set whether to stop auto-battle when a Girl is defeated in battle. If you choose not to stop the feature in this situation, the system will automatically fill your lineup with Girls available in order of their Power (from high to low) until all your Girls available are defeated.

name: INVITATION_HELP
translation: Campus Guide:|1. After completing the first 20 chapters in Growth Diary, you can enter this feature as a "Tutor" and share your invitation code to beginners (players below level 70). Your Tutor-Beginner relationship will be formed once the beginner player enters your invitation code in this feature, of which then you will receive rewards as a Tutor. Additional rewards as a Tutor can be obtained after a beginner player you're guiding completes the tasks in this feature.|2. A Tutor-Beginner relationship will end after the beginner player completes all the tasks. A Tutor can guide at most 10 beginner players at the same time. (Accounts under the same UID cannot start a Tutor-Beginner relationship). If a beginner you're guiding has been inactive in the last 7 days, you are able to end this relationship manually.|3. You can provide a gift for each beginner player you're guiding each day for free. Please don't forget to support them with these additional gifts!|4. You can get a Gem reward for sharing your progress (as a Tutor) in this feature each week. The reward will be refreshed at 0:00 (UTC/GMT 0) each Monday.\n\nNew on Campus:|1. You can enter the invitation code of a Tutor before you reach player level 70 to start a Tutor-Beginner relationship with the Tutor and get a reward. You can get more rewards for completing the tasks on this page.
